format: JavaScript (React-like component structure with LightningJS framework)
description: This file defines a top bar component for a web user interface, utilizing LightningJS framework components and themes. It includes layout and styling details, and initializes visual effects.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes component state with dimensions, colors, and effects.

methods.name: hooks.ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that sets up visual effects for the component upon readiness.
